title: Police Interceptors S01 WS PDTV XviD AcidXP
description:
Police Interceptors

This action-packed documentary series profiles the work of a high-speed police interception unit in Essex. Led by specially trained officers and equipped with the fastest vehicles in the force, the team tackles the most difficult-to-catch criminals on a daily basis. 

Series 1

Episode 1
Air Date: 09/05/08
New series profiling the work of a high-speed police interception unit in Essex. Police chase a drug dealer on a motorway at night, a drunk driver endangers his life in a bid to avoid arrest and the team of interceptors pursue one of the area\&#039;s most wanted car thieves.
 
Episode 2
Air Date: 16/05/08
The Essex-based high-speed police interception unit pursue a gang of would-be jewellery thieves, while a burglar leads the team on a car chase.

Episode 3
Air Date: 23/05/08
The high-speed police interception unit pursue a thief in a souped-up Ford Mondeo who outwits their turbocharged cars and causes chaos when he drives up a one-way street in the wrong direction. After one of their vehicles is rammed, the officers decide to use a stinger device to stop the criminal in his tracks.

Episode 4
Air Date: 30/05/08
The police pursue an escaped prisoner driving a getaway car down the wrong side of a dual carriageway and a stolen van being driven erratically through the streets of Essex. Plus, the Air Support Unit\&#039;s helicopter is called into action late at night to look for an armed robber.

Episode 5
Air Date: 06/06/08
A police chase ends with the driver of a stolen Lexus crashing the luxury motor, and the police interception unit deal with a car which is deemed too sexy by officers. Elsewhere, a high-speed pursuit results in a head-on collision with one of the team\&#039;s hi-tech vehicles.

Episode 6
Air Date: 13/06/08
The team discover the garage hideout of a gang of burglars in a country lane, and pursue a BMW driver who endangers his life by running across four lanes of a busy dual carriageway to escape with a suspicious package. The police interceptors also apprehend a mother driving with no tax, insurance or MOT, who turns out never to have passed her driving test.

Episode 7
Air Date: 20/06/08
Repeat of the best bits of Series 1.


Please Note: I have not recorded these episodes, I have simply collected them into one torrent from many different websites and sources.

Enjoy!

AcidXP
